title: Sit Command
description: Hold a treat above your dog's head and move it back. As their head follows the treat, their bottom will naturally lower to the ground.

title: Stay Command
description: Ask your dog to sit, then show your palm and say 'Stay'. Take one step back, then return and reward if they remain in position.

title: Down Command
description: From a sitting position, hold a treat near your dog's nose and slowly lower it to the ground between their paws.

title: Come Command
description: Call your dog's name followed by 'Come' in an excited voice. Reward generously when they reach you.

title: Leave It
description: Place a treat in your closed hand. When your dog stops trying to get it and looks away, reward with a different treat.

title: Drop It
description: When your dog has a toy, offer a high-value treat. As they drop the toy to take the treat, say 'Drop it'.

title: Wait Command
description: Teach your dog to pause before going through doors or eating meals. Use a hand signal and build duration gradually.

title: Heel Position
description: Teach your dog to walk close to your left side. Use treats to guide them into position and reward frequently.

title: Shake Hands
description: Gently tap your dog's paw while saying 'Shake'. When they lift their paw, shake it gently and reward.

title: High Five
description: Hold a treat in your raised hand. When your dog paws at your hand, say 'High five' and reward.

title: Roll Over
description: Start with your dog in a down position. Lure them with a treat in a circular motion over their shoulder.

title: Spin/Twirl
description: Hold a treat near your dog's nose and lure them in a circle. Say 'Spin' as they complete the turn.

title: Play Dead
description: From a down position, lure your dog onto their side. Use a verbal cue like 'Bang' and reward when they stay still.

title: Take a Bow
description: While your dog is standing, lure their head down between their front paws while keeping their rear end up.

title: Speak/Quiet
description: Encourage barking with a trigger, then say 'Speak'. For 'Quiet', reward when they stop barking on command.

title: Wave Hello
description: Start with 'Shake' command but move your hand slightly away so your dog paws the air instead of your hand.

title: Crawl
description: With your dog in a down position, lure them forward with a treat while keeping their belly on the ground.

title: Jump Through Hoop
description: Start with a hula hoop on the ground and lure your dog through. Gradually raise the hoop as they become comfortable.

title: Find the Treat
description: Hide a treat under one of three cups and encourage your dog to find it. Reward when they choose correctly.

title: Balance Treat on Nose
description: Teach your dog to hold still with a treat balanced on their nose. Say 'OK' to let them flip and catch it.

title: Go to Your Bed
description: Point to your dog's bed and say 'Go to bed'. Reward when they go to their designated spot.

title: Settle on Mat
description: Teach your dog to relax on a mat or blanket. Reward calm behavior and gradually increase duration.

title: Jumping
description: Turn away when your dog jumps up. Only give attention when all four paws are on the floor.

title: Polite Greetings
description: Ask visitors to ignore your dog until they're calm. Reward sitting politely when meeting new people.

title: No Begging
description: Feed your dog before family meals and teach them to stay in their bed during human meal times.

title: Loose Leash Walking
description: Stop moving when your dog pulls. Only continue walking when the leash is loose.

title: Automatic Sit
description: Teach your dog to automatically sit whenever you stop walking during your walks.

title: Focus on Walks
description: Practice getting your dog's attention during walks. Reward when they check in with you voluntarily.
